Class HDBmanager

java.lang.Object
bto.model.UserPerson
bto.model.HDBmanager
All Implemented Interfaces:
enquiryInterface
public class HDBmanager extends UserPerson implements enquiryInterface
HDBmanagers is a class that extends UserPerson and subsequently implements the EnquiryInterface Inherits the methods and attributes of the UserPerson class for each Manager person Implements concrete methods of the methods in the enquiry interface Has functions to create/edit/delete BTO listings Approves/Rejects BTO applications and officers registering to handle the project

    Manager able to approve withdrawal request by applicants who applied for the project If successfully allowed to be withdrawn, update project details accordingly Updates application status to "Withdrawn" and displays message approving withdrawal request

    Creates project listings with all the details of the listing accounted for Manager who creates the project listing will automatically become the Manager in charge Checks whether the manager already has a project under his name during the same period Returns null if manager is already managing another project Returns newly created Project should creation be successful
    void
    deleteBTOListings(int projectID)
    Manager choosing to delete BTO listing that he has created Checks if project exists using project ID Checks if project has active applications, don't allow deletion checks if project has active registrations, don't allow deletion Checks if project has no applications or registrations, allow deletion

    • viewOwnStatus

      public void viewOwnStatus()
      Overrides the method in the UserPerson's class Method implemented uses the superclass's method in addition to adding more Fits the manager class more as it displays more details that only the managers have
      Overrides:
      viewOwnStatus in class UserPerson

    • createBTOListings

      public Project createBTOListings(String projectName, String neighborhood, int twoRoomCount, int twoRoompx, int threeRoomCount, int threeRoompx, boolean projectVisibility, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int officerSlots)
      Creates project listings with all the details of the listing accounted for Manager who creates the project listing will automatically become the Manager in charge Checks whether the manager already has a project under his name during the same period Returns null if manager is already managing another project Returns newly created Project should creation be successful
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of project
      neighborhood - area which project would be built at
      twoRoomCount - number of two rooms to be in the project
      twoRoompx -
      threeRoomCount - number of three rooms to be in the project
      threeRoompx -
      projectVisibility - visibility of project depending on whether manager wants to change turn it on or off
      openingDate - application period where applicants can apply for the project
      closingDate - deadline for application period
      officerSlots - number of officers allowed to handle the project
      Returns:

    • editBTOListings

      public void editBTOListings(int projectID, String field, Object newValue)
      Manager able to change the details of the project by updating it with new information Checks against the project ID to see if project exists Prints error message and return if no project matches the project ID Throws an error when invalid value type is input and catches the error to print out error message
      Parameters:
      projectID - project ID to check if exists
      field - information to be changed in the project
      newValue - new details of the project to be updated

    • deleteBTOListings

      public void deleteBTOListings(int projectID)
      Manager choosing to delete BTO listing that he has created Checks if project exists using project ID Checks if project has active applications, don't allow deletion checks if project has active registrations, don't allow deletion Checks if project has no applications or registrations, allow deletion
      Parameters:
      projectID - ID of project to be deleted

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public void toggleProjectVisibility(int projectID, boolean visible)

      Parameters:
      projectID - project ID to be changed
      visible - visibility setting to be changed to

    • approveWithdrawalRequest

      public void approveWithdrawalRequest(int projectID, String applicantNRIC)

      Parameters:
      projectID - ID of project
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of Applicant requesting to withdraw from project

      Parameters:
      projectID - ID of project
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of applicant
